content: 1st 2 sts double_crochet across to last 3 sts make decrease over 2 sts double_crochet in last st chain 3 turn row 9 10 repeat row 8 fasten yarn cuffs work 2 row of rib stitch as for body of sweater finishing with right sides together sew shoulder seams sew in sleeves fold right sides together and sew underarm and side seams turn right side out neck trim attach yarn at left back neck chain 3 double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 double_crochet in each of next 2 sts double_crochet in next 5 sts 2 double_crochet in each of next 2 sts double_crochet in next 2 sts work double_crochet ch2 2 half_double_crochet in next st buttonhole work 8 half_double_crochet along right back opening slip_stitch in base of chain-3 at beginning of left back chain 2 work 12 half_double_crochet along left back opening fasten yarn weave in ends sew button on left back © 2006 beverly button http //www buttonspecialties com
